name: Topan Ascetic
originalText: Tap an untapped creature you control: Topan Ascetic gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Since Topan Ascetic’s activated ability doesn’t have a tap symbol in its cost, you can tap a creature (including Topan Ascetic itself) that hasn’t been under your control since your most recent turn began to pay the cost.

text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Topan Ascetic gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
